column7: knob of butter|Step1: Lightly whisk 2 large eggs
column8: 6 tbsp single cream or full cream milk and a pinch of salt together until the mixture has just one consistency.
column9: Step2: Heat a small non-stick frying pan for a minute or so
column10: then add a knob of butter and let it melt. Don’t allow the butter to brown or it will discolour the eggs.
